full_summary:
===============

**Request for Proposal (RFP) for Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger - J10**

**Contract Information:**

* **Contract Reference Number:** PW-_MCT-045-6277
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Solicitation Number:** W6898-230601/B
* **Publication Date:** November 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 7, 2022, at 13:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A

**Government of Canada Tender Information:**

* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Good(s) and Service(s) Information:**

* **Goods and Services Identifier (GSIN):** N4420C - Heat Exchangers
* **Description:** Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger - J10
* **Location:** 5th Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown, building J10, located in Oromocto, New Brunswick
* **Delivery Dates:** All items must be delivered on or before March 31, 2023

**Eligibility:**

* Suppliers interested in submitting a bid must be able to deliver the goods and services to the specified location within the stated timeframe.
* There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

**Contracting Authority:**

* Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact: MacFarlane (MCT), Andrew, Contact Information: [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or (782) 377-4248

**Submissions and Inquiries:**

* Submissions must be made through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) available at Buyandsell.gc.ca.
* Inquiries regarding this requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.

**Attachments:**

* Basis of Payment: Annex_Basis_of_Payment_W6898-230601B_J10_Bilingual.xlsx
* EBSU001: Annex_Statement_of_Requirement_PW_MCT_B045_E6277_EBSU001.PDF
* EBSU000: Annex_Statement_of_Requirement_PW_MCT
